code:
import sys

# Read input from stdin
data = sys.stdin.read().strip()

# Simple example: if input is numbers, add them
if data.replace(' ', '').replace('\n', '').isdigit():
    numbers = [int(x) for x in data.split()]
    result = sum(numbers)
    print(result)
else:
    # If it's text, reverse it
    print(data[::-1])
